B

Ball - Class in model
This is the Ball class, which is what is drawn on the screen, and implements Observer to use dispatching.
Ball(Color, Point, int, Point, Container, IUpdateStrategy, IPaintStrategy) - Constructor for class model.Ball
This is the Ball constructor, which sets its initial values.
BallPaintStrategy - Class in model
This is the ball paint strategy, which implements a paint strategy for a ball.
BallPaintStrategy() - Constructor for class model.BallPaintStrategy
This is the default constructor for BallPaintStrategy.
BallWorldController - Class in controller
This is the BallWorldController, that has private variables for model and view, and is able to interface between them.
BallWorldController() - Constructor for class controller.BallWorldController
This is the constructor for BallWorldController, which creates anonymous inner classes for the adapters, and defines their functions.
BallWorldModel - Class in model
This is the BallWorldModel class, which makes balls, clears balls, and updates the balls.
BallWorldModel(IModel2ViewAdapter) - Constructor for class model.BallWorldModel
This is the BallWorldModel constructor, which creates a model for the controller to interact with.
BallWorldView<TDropListItem> - Class in view
This is the BallWorldView class, which has the frame on which our BallWorld is displayed.
BallWorldView(IView2ModelAdapter<TDropListItem>) - Constructor for class view.BallWorldView
Create the frame
bounce() - Method in class model.Ball
This function checks to see if the ball has come into contact with one of the boundaries of the panel.
BreathingStrategy - Class in model
This class defines a Breathing Strategy, which grows and shrinks the ball's radius.
BreathingStrategy() - Constructor for class model.BreathingStrategy
 
btnAddPaintStrat - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This is a button that adds the text field to the paint strategy factories drop down.
btnAddToList - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This is a button that lets you add the text field input as a strategy factory to the JComboBox.
btnClearBalls - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This button clears the balls on the canvas.
btnCombine - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This button lets you combine strategies.
btnMakeSelectedBall - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This lets you makes a ball with the selected strategy.
btnMakeSwitcher - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This lets you make a switcher ball.
btnSwitch - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
This lets you switch the switcher balls to the current strategy factory's make on the top combo box.
